data.eml:eml: New Siberian “ spineless ” species of Thalassaphorura Bagnall, 1949 (Collembola, Onychiuridae), with a key to world species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaprus’, Igor, Paśnik, Grzegorz (2017): New Siberian “ spineless ” species of Thalassaphorura Bagnall, 1949 (Collembola, Onychiuridae), with a key to world species of the genus. Zootaxa 4362 (2): 225-245, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.2.3
